choices.D: Different SSL VPN realms for each group
choices.B: Two separate SSL VPNs in different interfaces mapping the same ssl.root
choices.A: Different virtual SSL VPN IP addresses for each group
choices.C: Two firewall policies with different captive portals

questions.question_text:
A company needs to provide SSL VPN access to two user groups. The company also needs to display a different welcome message for each group, on the SSL
VPN login.
To meet these requirements, what is required in the SSL VPN configuration?

discussion.content: B & D are correct - FGT_Infrastructure-6.2, p.29 (route are static, so metric is the same)

Selected Answer: BD
When there are two or more duplicate static routes that have the same distance, FortiGate installs all of them in the routing table. If they also have the same priority, then the routes are known as ECMP static routes.

questions.question_text: Which two route attributes must be equal for static routes to be eligible for equal cost multipath (ECMP) routing? (Choose two.)

choices.C: The DHCP server provides the PAC file for download.
choices.B: The browser sends a DHCPINFORM request to the DHCP server.
choices.D: The browser needs to be preconfigured with the DHCP server IP address.
choices.A: If the DHCP method fails, browsers will try the DNS method.

discussion.content: A & B are correct - FGT_Infrastructure-6.2, p. 343

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true when using WPAD with the DHCP discovery method? (Choose two.)

choices.A: Access to browser-based Social.Media applications will be blocked.
choices.D: Access to all unknown applications will be allowed.
choices.B: Access to mobile social media applications will be blocked.
choices.C: Access to all applications in the Social.Media category will be blocked.

discussion.content: A, D are correct. C is not correct, why ?because the URL category ovverride application filtering. All applications in social media cannot be blocked only browser based.
A & D are correct, FGT_Security-6.2, p. 443

comments.content: Have you ever used a Fortigate ? Or read any materials ? You have put several wrong answers as right on this file, please do your research and back up you claims with evidence not just x and x are correct as this is not helpful to people who actually want to learn and understand.
